title: Zooly Labs: Hip Replacement Innovation Assessment
description: Transforming Orthopedic Surgery Through AI-Guided Precision

elements.name: intro_text
elements.html:
Thank you for your interest in the future of orthopedic surgery. Zooly Labs has developed a revolutionary smart sensor that uses artificial intelligence to guide perfect hip component positioning based on each patient's unique anatomy.

Our technology addresses this critical challenge while simplifying your workflow during a total hip replacement.

Complete this 3-minute assessment to:

  • Receive a personalized report on how Zooly's technology could benefit your practice
  • Get exclusive early access to our clinical validation data
  • Reserve your spot for a hands-on demonstration
  • Join our limited Surgeon Advisory Panel (qualified respondents only)

elements.name: research_info
elements.html:
According to research by Kenney et al. (2019), the percentage of revision total hip arthroplasty failures are due to:

  • Aseptic loosening: 23%
  • Instability: 23%
  • Infection: 22%

Many of these failures are directly linked to component positioning accuracy.

elements.name: solution_intro
elements.html:
Introducing Zooly: Simple, Smart, Surgical Precision

Our proprietary AI-driven sensor technology:

  • Sets up in just 5 minutes
  • Provides accuracy and reliability for perfect component positioning
  • Works with your preferred implants and surgical approach
  • Reduces the need for pre-operative planning and imaging
  • Saves approximately $1,500 per case
  • Requires no capital equipment investment

Unlike previous technologies, Zooly doesn't dictate your workflowâ€”it enhances your expertise with precise, personalized guidance based on each patient's unique joint kinematics.
